topic.topicDialog: If your teacher has assigned you Kerboodle Books, they can be accessed through Kerboodle in the following ways.

step.stepTextTip: 1. Clicking on the Book title on your homepage.
2. Clicking on the Go to my Bookshelf or Launch Kerboodle Book button on the course page.

Your bookshelf will open in a new window, just click on your Kerboodle Book cover to access the book.

If you've accessed the book by clicking on it's title on your hompage, you'll miss this step and be taken straight to the book pages.
The contents page will give you the option to open a particular chapter, or the last page viewed.
Your Kerboodle Book will then open on the page you selected.
